title: [Tower of Knowledge, Library]
description: Centered along the back wall is a polished alder desk neatly laid out with fresh parchment and a full well of ink.  A cushioned alder chair accompanies the desk, and hanging above is a portrait of an unnamed female aelotoi in a yellow wizard robe and hat.  Occupying the remaining wall space are floor-to-ceiling bookshelves overflowing with books, tomes, scrolls, and parchments.  Suspended from the ceiling is a polished brass chandelier.
